languages.text: "Что ж, до сих пор у них ничего не вышло. И ваша заслуга в том весьма огромна". {n}Кассия горько смеется.{/n} "Не волнуйтесь, Вольный Торговец, мой Дом более не доставит вам проблем. Пока мне удается поддерживать внутри династии хрупкое перемирие, подернутое сизой дымкой. Ну а что будет дальше... покажет время".

traits.locale_text: "Что ж, до сих пор у них ничего не вышло. И ваша заслуга в том весьма огромна". {n}Кассия горько смеется.{/n} "Не волнуйтесь, Вольный Торговец, мой Дом более не доставит вам проблем. Пока мне удается поддерживать внутри династии хрупкое перемирие, подернутое сизой дымкой. Ну а что будет дальше... покажет время".
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: "Well, they have been unsuccessful so far. And an enormous part of the credit for that lies with you." {n}Cassia laughs a bitter laugh.{/n} "Worry not, Rogue Trader. My House will trouble you no more. For now, I'm able to maintain the blue-grey haze of a fragile truce within my dynasty. As to what happens next... time will tell."
languages.original_text: "Что ж, до сих пор у них ничего не вышло. И ваша заслуга в том весьма огромна". {n}Кассия горько смеется.{/n} "Не волнуйтесь, Вольный Торговец, мой Дом более не доставит вам проблем. Пока мне удается поддерживать внутри династии хрупкое перемирие, подернутое сизой дымкой. Ну а что будет дальше... покажет время".

My House will trouble you no more. For now, I'm able to maintain the blue-gray haze of a fragile truce within my dynasty. As to what happens next... time will tell."

My House will trouble you no more. For now, I'm able to maintain the blue-grey haze of a fragile truce within my dynasty. As to what happens next... time will tell."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: “是啊，到目前为止，他们都失败了。这其中很大一部分应当归功于你。”{n}卡西娅苦涩地笑了起来。{/n}“不必担心，行商浪人，我们的家族不会再给你添麻烦了。目前，我依然可以维持那脆弱的灰蓝色雾霭，让我的家族内部保持休战状态。至于接下来会发生什么事情……时间会告诉我们的。”
languages.original_text: "Well, they have been unsuccessful so far. And an enormous part of the credit for that lies with you." {n}Cassia laughs a bitter laugh.{/n} "Worry not, Rogue Trader. My House will trouble you no more. For now, I'm able to maintain the blue-grey haze of a fragile truce within my dynasty. As to what happens next... time will tell."

traits.locale_text: “是啊，到目前为止，他们都失败了。这其中很大一部分应当归功于你。”{n}卡西娅苦涩地笑了起来。{/n}“不必担心，行商浪人，我们的家族不会再给你添麻烦了。目前，我依然可以维持那脆弱的灰蓝色雾霭，让我的家族内部保持休战状态。至于接下来会发生什么事情……时间会告诉我们的。”
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.original_text: "Well, they have been unsuccessful so far. And an enormous part of the credit for that lies with you." {n}Cassia laughs a bitter laugh.{/n} "Worry not, Rogue Trader. My House will trouble you no more. For now, I'm able to maintain the blue-grey haze of a fragile truce within my dynasty. As to what happens next... time will tell."

languages.text: «De momento no han tenido éxito. Y gran parte de eso se lo debo a usted». {n}Cassia ríe amargamente.{/n} «No se preocupe, Comerciante Independiente. Mi casa no le molestará más. Por ahora, estoy manteniendo una frágil tregua de azul grisáceo en mi dinastía. En cuanto al futuro... el tiempo lo dirá».
languages.original_text: "Well, they have been unsuccessful so far. And an enormous part of the credit for that lies with you." {n}Cassia laughs a bitter laugh.{/n} "Worry not, Rogue Trader. My House will trouble you no more. For now, I'm able to maintain the blue-grey haze of a fragile truce within my dynasty. As to what happens next... time will tell."

traits.locale_text: «De momento no han tenido éxito. Y gran parte de eso se lo debo a usted». {n}Cassia ríe amargamente.{/n} «No se preocupe, Comerciante Independiente. Mi casa no le molestará más. Por ahora, estoy manteniendo una frágil tregua de azul grisáceo en mi dinastía. En cuanto al futuro... el tiempo lo dirá».
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: 「とはいえ、彼らは今のところ成功していません。その功績の大部分はあなたにあるのです」{n}カシアは苦笑いを浮かべる。{/n}「心配しないでください、自由開拓者様。私の家はもうあなたを悩ませることはありません。今のところ、私の王朝内では青灰色の靄のようなもろい停戦状態を維持できています。この先どうなるかは…時が教えてくれるでしょう」
languages.original_text: "Well, they have been unsuccessful so far. And an enormous part of the credit for that lies with you." {n}Cassia laughs a bitter laugh.{/n} "Worry not, Rogue Trader. My House will trouble you no more. For now, I'm able to maintain the blue-grey haze of a fragile truce within my dynasty. As to what happens next... time will tell."

traits.locale_text: 「とはいえ、彼らは今のところ成功していません。その功績の大部分はあなたにあるのです」{n}カシアは苦笑いを浮かべる。{/n}「心配しないでください、自由開拓者様。私の家はもうあなたを悩ませることはありません。今のところ、私の王朝内では青灰色の靄のようなもろい停戦状態を維持できています。この先どうなるかは…時が教えてくれるでしょう」
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: "Nun, bisher waren sie erfolglos. Und das ist zu großen Teilen allein Euch zu verdanken." {n}Cassia lacht verbittert auf.{/n} "Sorgt Euch nicht, {mf|Freihändler|Freihändlerin}. Mein Haus wird Euch nicht mehr behelligen. Vorerst kann ich den blau-grauen Nebel eines brüchigen Waffenstillstands innerhalb meiner Dynastie bewahren. Und was danach geschieht ... wird die Zeit zeigen."
languages.original_text: "Well, they have been unsuccessful so far. And an enormous part of the credit for that lies with you." {n}Cassia laughs a bitter laugh.{/n} "Worry not, Rogue Trader. My House will trouble you no more. For now, I'm able to maintain the blue-grey haze of a fragile truce within my dynasty. As to what happens next... time will tell."

traits.locale_text: "Nun, bisher waren sie erfolglos. Und das ist zu großen Teilen allein Euch zu verdanken." {n}Cassia lacht verbittert auf.{/n} "Sorgt Euch nicht, {mf|Freihändler|Freihändlerin}. Mein Haus wird Euch nicht mehr behelligen. Vorerst kann ich den blau-grauen Nebel eines brüchigen Waffenstillstands innerhalb meiner Dynastie bewahren. Und was danach geschieht ... wird die Zeit zeigen."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: « Ils ont échoué jusqu'ici, et je me dois d'ajouter que c'est principalement grâce à vous, {n}déclare Cassia avec un petit rire amer.{/n} Ne vous inquiétez pas, {mf|libre-marchand|libre-marchande}. Ma maison ne sera plus un fardeau pour vous. Pour le moment, je parviens à préserver la brume bleu-gris qui enveloppe ma dynastie dans une trêve fragile. Le temps nous dira ce que nous réserve l'avenir. »
languages.original_text: "Well, they have been unsuccessful so far. And an enormous part of the credit for that lies with you." {n}Cassia laughs a bitter laugh.{/n} "Worry not, Rogue Trader. My House will trouble you no more. For now, I'm able to maintain the blue-grey haze of a fragile truce within my dynasty. As to what happens next... time will tell."

traits.locale_text: « Ils ont échoué jusqu'ici, et je me dois d'ajouter que c'est principalement grâce à vous, {n}déclare Cassia avec un petit rire amer.{/n} Ne vous inquiétez pas, {mf|libre-marchand|libre-marchande}. Ma maison ne sera plus un fardeau pour vous. Pour le moment, je parviens à préserver la brume bleu-gris qui enveloppe ma dynastie dans une trêve fragile. Le temps nous dira ce que nous réserve l'avenir. »
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: "Bugüne kadar başarılı olamadılar. Bunun büyük bir sebebi de sensin." {n}Cassia acı acı kahkaha atıyor.{/n} "Hiç endişen olmasın Hür Tacir. Hanem artık başına bela olmayacak. Şimdilik hanedanlık içinde mavi grimsi, kırılgan bir ateşkes sağlayabildim. İleride olacakları ise ancak zamanı gelince göreceğiz."
languages.original_text: "Well, they have been unsuccessful so far. And an enormous part of the credit for that lies with you." {n}Cassia laughs a bitter laugh.{/n} "Worry not, Rogue Trader. My House will trouble you no more. For now, I'm able to maintain the blue-grey haze of a fragile truce within my dynasty. As to what happens next... time will tell."

traits.locale_text: "Henüz başarılı olamadılar sonuçta. Bunun büyük bir sebebi de sensin." {n}Cassia acı acı kahkaha atıyor.{/n} "Hiç endişen olmasın Hür Tacir. Hanem artık başına bela olmayacak. Şimdilik hanedanlığımla aramda mavi ve gri bir sis renginde, hassas bir ateşkes sürdürebiliyorum. Daha sonra ne olacağını ise ancak zamanı gelince göreceğiz."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion
